# Packages on CRAN:
```{r cran}
tb <- tibble(
  name = c('redist', 'geomander', 'PL94171', 'censable'),
  logo = '',
  info = c('redist: Simulation Methods for Legislative Redistricting (with Cory McCartan, Ben Fifield, and Kosuke Imai)', 
           'geomander: Geographic Tools for Studying Gerrymandering',
           'PL94171: Tabulate P.L. 94-171 Redistricting Data Summary Files (with Cory McCartan) ',
           'censable: Making Census Data More Usable')
)

tb %>% select(-name) %>% 
  kbl(format = 'html', col.names = NULL, toprule = TRUE, escape = FALSE) %>%
  column_spec(1,
              image = spec_image(
                path = c('hexes/hex_redist.png', 
                         'hexes/hex_geomander.png', 
                         'hexes/hex_pl94171.png',
                         'hexes/hex_censable.png'), 
                width = 250, 
                height = 250)) %>% 
  column_spec(2, 
              link = c('https://alarm-redist.github.io/redist/',
                       'https://christopherkenny.github.io/geomander/',
                       'https://corymccartan.github.io/PL94171/',
                       'https://christopherkenny.github.io/censable/'))
```
